title: Deutsch Direkt! [kit]
brief_description: The kit contains three audio-cassettes, a workbook and guide for teachers which can all be used in conjunction with the videorecorded course in simple German. The cassettes include some of the conversations from the video programs, with some pronunciation exercises. The books include language notes, exercises, background information, reading passages and progress checks as well as a handy reference section. Contents: 3 audio-cassettes, 2 books.
